name: Mar-kurse
description:
Intro:

Mar-kurse is a cursed person who is trapped in a demon world. The demons keep chasing him. Help him find his way out of this world. If the player dies, he is respawned again.

Objective: 

Run away from the monsters. Use W, A, S and D to move player. The player dies as soon as the monsters hit the player. Collect keys to move to the next level. 

Note:

The game currently has two simple levels and no saving system. Additional systems to appear.

Bugs:

Currently, only the movement gets restricted sometimes. Try to move around in other directions to set the player free.

Dev Talk:

Hope all of you enjoy this game and comment on how you feel about this.

Jam:

Kenney Jam 2020
